name: PUT request - Update an existing post

steps.name: Given  I set request body for PUT with title "Updated Post", body "Updated Body", and userId "101"
When  I send a PUT request to "/posts/1"
Then  the response status code should be 200
And  the response field "title" should be "Updated Post"
